name: Magilean Manor (Demo)
description:
Hello, and thank you for checking out my game!

Magilean Manor is an RPGHorror game made as a tribute to classics like Corpse Party and Au Oni. The game features you, the player, arriving at their new job as a housekeeper. Your job is to get everything back in order so the Owner can turn it into a guest house. The game takes course over five nights fixing up the manor. The instructions are simple - go to work, do your tasks, and leave for the night.

If only it was that simple.

Monsters roam the halls and are waiting at every turn to jump out at you. Sorrowful spirits are still shackled to the walls. There is so much more to this manor than it seems. Can you earn your pay and avoid the awful creatures here? Will you choose to free the ghosts whose lives were taken all those years ago? And most importantly, can you survive the horrors of Magilean Manor?

WARNING - This game does contain jumpscares and common horror elements. If you have epilepsy, probably don't play this game.
